title: Build pretty boxplots fast — ppp_boxplot
code: my_comparisons <- list(c("female", "hermaphroditic"), c("female", "male"), c("female", "none")) my_colors <- c("#337495", "#002a33", "#2f5a69", "#143b44") my_method = "wilcox.test" ppp_boxplot(data = starwars,             x_var = "sex",              y_var = "height",              comparisons = my_comparisons,              colors = my_colors,              method = my_method) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'starwars' not found
